title: Secrets & Lies-1996-DVDRip-x264_OPTIMIZED
description:
I don't like to spoil anything, just in case you haven't hear about the movie status.. taken from wikipedia :

AWARDS

The film was a critical success. It has a 94% approval rating on Rotten Tomatoes with an average rating of 8.7.[3]

The film won the prestigious Palme d'Or and Best Actress (Brenda Blethyn) awards at the 1996 Cannes Film Festival,[1] and Golden Globe and 

BAFTA Best Actress awards.

The film was also nominated for Academy Awards for Best Actress in a Leading Role (Brenda Blethyn), Best Actress in a Supporting Role 

(Marianne Jean-Baptiste), Best Director, Best Picture and Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen.

Influential film critic Roger Ebert entered the film to his Great Movies
 
collection in 2009.[4]

    BAFTA
        Best Actress - Brenda Blethyn - WON
        Best Film
        Best British Film - WON
        Best Screenplay - WON
        Best Supporting Actress

VIDEO
I have worked to find and use the "best" avisynth technology on the DVD source, and applied the strongest denoising/sharpening that wouldn't 

remove any noticable precision (and obv. thanx to high quality x264 encoding not loose anything noticeable there too).
I think the result is NICER to MOST eyes than the DVD ! Download the sample if you don't believe me.
Anyway, as far as compressed version go, it's the best you'll find around, the reasson being that I wouldn't have bothered making another release if 

the offer was satisfying.
